00023 FirstCompleteAPGenerator::~FirstCompleteAPGenerator(){
00024     // delete all sub-pulses
00025     for(PulseIslandList::iterator i_tpi=fSubPulses.begin(); i_tpi!=fSubPulses.end(); ++i_tpi){ 
00026         delete *i_tpi;

00032   TVAnalysedPulseGenerator::SetChannel(det);

00035 
00036 int FirstCompleteAPGenerator::ProcessPulses( 
00037         const PulseIslandList& pulseList,
00038         AnalysedPulseList& analysedList){
00039 
00040     // The variables that this generator will be filling
00041     double amplitude, time, integral;
00042 
00043     // Get the relevant TSetupData/SetupNavigator variables for the algorithms
00044     std::string bankname = pulseList[0]->GetBankName();
00045     std::string detname = TSetupData::Instance()->GetDetectorName(bankname);
00046     IDs::channel channel(detname);
00047 
00048     fMaxBinAmplitude.pedestal 
00049         = fConstantFractionTime.pedestal 
00050         = fSimpleIntegral.pedestal 
00051         = SetupNavigator::Instance()->GetPedestal(channel);
00052     fMaxBinAmplitude.trigger_polarity 
00053         = fConstantFractionTime.trigger_polarity 
00054         = fSimpleIntegral.trigger_polarity 
00055         = TSetupData::Instance()->GetTriggerPolarity(bankname);
00056     fConstantFractionTime.max_adc_value = std::pow(2, TSetupData::Instance()->GetNBits(bankname)) - 1;
00057     fConstantFractionTime.clock_tick_in_ns = TSetupData::Instance()->GetClockTick(bankname);
00058     fConstantFractionTime.time_shift = TSetupData::Instance()->GetTimeShift(bankname);
00059 
00060     TAnalysedPulse* tap;
00061     // Loop over all the TPIs given to us
00062     for (PulseIslandList::const_iterator original_tpi=pulseList.begin();
00063             original_tpi!=pulseList.end(); original_tpi++){
00064 
00065       // Look for more than one pulse on the TPI
00066         fPulseCandidateFinder->FindPulseCandidates(*original_tpi);
00067         int n_pulse_candidates = fPulseCandidateFinder->GetNPulseCandidates();
00068         fPulseCandidateFinder->GetPulseCandidates(fSubPulses);
00069 
00070         if(Debug()) {
00071           std::cout << "FirstCompleteAPGenerator: " << GetChannel().str() 
00072                     << ": n_pulse_candidates = " << n_pulse_candidates  << std::endl;
00073         }
00074 
00075         if (Debug() && n_pulse_candidates > 10
00076                 && GetChannel().str() != "muSc" && GetChannel().str() != "muScA"
00077                 && GetChannel().str() != "ScL" && GetChannel().str() != "ScR"
00078                 && GetChannel().str() != "ScGe" && GetChannel().str() != "ScVe") {
00079             DrawPulse(original_tpi-pulseList.begin(),
00080                     (*original_tpi)->GetTimeStamp(),
00081                     (*original_tpi)->GetPulseLength());
00082         }
00083 
00084         for(PulseIslandList::const_iterator i_tpi=fSubPulses.begin(); i_tpi!=fSubPulses.end(); ++i_tpi){
00085             // Skip small pulses.  This must be at least 1 to skip empty pulses
00086           //            PulseIslandList::const_iterator i_tpi=original_tpi;
00087             if((*i_tpi)->GetPulseLength() < 14) continue;
00088 
00089             // Analyse each TPI
00090             amplitude=fMaxBinAmplitude(*i_tpi);
00091             time=fConstantFractionTime(*i_tpi);
00092             integral=fSimpleIntegral(*i_tpi);
00093 
00094             // Now that we've found the information we were looking for make a TAP to
00095             // hold it.  This method makes a TAP and sets the parent TPI info.  It needs
00096             // the index of the parent TPI in the container as an argument
00097             tap = MakeNewTAP(original_tpi-pulseList.begin());
00098             tap->SetAmplitude(amplitude);
00099             tap->SetTime(time);
00100             tap->SetIntegral(integral);
00101 
00102             // Finally add the new TAP to the output list
00103             analysedList.push_back(tap);
00104 
00105         } // loop over all sub-pulses
00106 
00107 
00108     } // loop over all original TPIs
00109 
00110     return 0;
00111 }
00112 
00113 void FirstCompleteAPGenerator::DrawPulse(int original, int pulse_timestamp, int n_pulse_samples){
00114 
00115     if( ExportPulse::Instance())
00116         ExportPulse::Instance()->AddToExportList(GetChannel().str(), original);
00117     else return;
00118 
00119     for (std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::const_iterator subPulseIter = fSubPulses.begin();
00120             subPulseIter != fSubPulses.end(); ++subPulseIter) {
00121         std::stringstream histname;
00122         histname << "hSubPulse_" << GetChannel() << "_Event" 
00123             << EventNavigator::Instance().EntryNo() <<"_Pulse" << original
00124             << "_SubPulse" << subPulseIter - fSubPulses.begin();
00125 
00126         const std::vector<int>& sub_pulse_samples = (*subPulseIter)->GetSamples();
00127 
00128         TH1D* hPulse = new TH1D(modules::parser::ToCppValid(histname.str()).c_str(),
00129                 histname.str().c_str(), n_pulse_samples,0,n_pulse_samples);
00130         hPulse->SetLineColor(kMagenta);
00131 
00132         int delay = (*subPulseIter)->GetTimeStamp() - pulse_timestamp;
00133         for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator subPulseSampleIter = sub_pulse_samples.begin();
00134                 subPulseSampleIter != sub_pulse_samples.end(); ++subPulseSampleIter) {
00135             hPulse->Fill( (subPulseSampleIter - sub_pulse_samples.begin()) + delay, (*subPulseSampleIter) );
00136         }
00137     }
00138 }
